title.rendered: Air New Zealand in United Kingdom

content.rendered:
Air New Zealand Limited is the flag carrier airline of New Zealand. Based in Auckland, the airline operates scheduled passenger flights to 21 domestic and 31 international destinations in 19 countries around the Pacific rim and the United Kingdom. The airline has been a member of the Star Alliance since 1999. Air New Zealand originated in 1940 as Tasman Empire Airways Limited (TEAL), a company operating trans-Tasman flights between New Zealand and Australia. TEAL became wholly owned by the New Zealand government in 1965, whereupon it was renamed Air New Zealand.

Address: c/o ASIG/Global Baggage Services

Call Centre: 0203 092 5242 (charges apply for calls outside UK)

Online access to Alternative Dispute Resolution (ADR): There is a European online platform (http://ec.europa.eu/odr) which facilitates access to ADR. However please note that at the present time, Air New Zealand does not participate in an ADR scheme in the UK.

Damaged, delayed, lost baggage claims

Baggage Services should only be contacted if your baggage has been damaged, delayed or lost on a flight you have recently taken
